page.title: 18THE RED ARROWS
page.content: From 1965 to 1983, {The Red Arrows} were based at {R.A.F.Kemble.}They are famous all over the world for their stunts and aerobatics. In 1983 they were transferred to Lincolnshire and all the people in Kemble were sad to see them go. We never got any peace when they were practising but we enjoyed seeing them. When they first came to Kemble, they flew Gnats but now they fly Hawks. When{The Red Arrows}left, we gave them two books of drawings and poems by the children and they gave us a signed poster. They gave us a special fly past over the school and it was televised by the BBC and ITV.
